title: Lakeland Ledger: Local News, Politics & Sports in Lakeland, FL
text:
Summer-like temps coming fast. How hot it's expected to get in Polk County

The National Weather Service in Jacksonville is warning that, based on current forecasts, records could be set or tied as temperatures climb.
